title: EDA_Cleaning_Keras=(LSTM+Clustering)
description: Rotten Tomatoes is an American review-aggregation website for film and television. The company was launched in August 1998 by three undergraduate students at the University of California, Berkeley: Senh Duong, Patrick Y. Lee and Stephen Wang. The name "Rotten Tomatoes" derives from the practice of audiences throwing rotten tomatoes when disapproving of a poor stage performance EvalutionSubmissions are evaluated on classification accuracy (the percent of labels that are predicted correctly) for every parsed phrase. The sentiment labels are: 0 - negative 1 - somewhat negative 2 - neutral 3 - somewhat positive 4 - positive
